title: The fit.

title: Only brand I'll wear
content: To elaborate, this is the 1st style in a long time that doesn't exaggerate the "muffin-top" look that plagues the mature figure FAR too often. That said, I had hoped these would be the same style, but having a nylon body and cotton insert. I like these all-cotton ones as much, but there are times the other fabric works better as it slides under whatever you're wearing and doesn't "stick" at all, if that makes sense. I just happened on this nylon one (exact same style) by accident a few years ago and they quickly became favorites, but these are wonderful, too.
